item.title: Neural Style Transfer Explained
item.description: Neural Style Transfer Welcome Everyone to the journey into Neural Style transfer. Are you ready ? Okay, Let’s dive. üòÉ Level one : Introduction With the rise of Deep Learning technology people invented awesome things using this technology. Neural style transfer (aka Artistic style transfer) is one of the amazing works. It is introduced in 2015 by Gatys et al. I’m not going to make you sleepy by discussing details in the paper at this level.

item.title: About
item.description: I am a Mechatronic Engineer who is an enthusiast in Robotics, Machine learning and Computer vision fields. Facts about myself: Born in Jan 1994 Location : Colombo, Sri Lanka Education : Ananda College, Colombo, SL (High School 1999 - 2013) B.Sc in Mechatronic Engineering from General Sir John Kotelawala Defence University, SL (2014 - 2018) Work : Senior Executive @ Dialog Axiata PLC - (2018 June to Present) Things I truly ‚ù§Ô∏è
